recipes.name: rice
instructions: Rinse the rice thoroughly under running water.
Bring water to a boil in a medium-sized pot.
Add rice, salt, and oil (if using) to the boiling water.
Reduce heat to low, cover the pot, and simmer for 15-20 minutes until the water is absorbed.
Turn off the heat and let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.

recipes.name: pasta
instructions: Fill a large pot with water and bring it to a boil.
Add salt and olive oil to the boiling water.
Add the pasta and cook according to the package instructions until al dente.
Drain the pasta and serve with your favorite sauce.
